727787f-a.text:
Queens Boulevard, north from 87th Avenue, showing the thoroughfare being repaved by W.P.A. laborers.
P. L. Sperr  April 23, 1936

727788f-a.text:
Queens Boulevard, at the N.W. corner of 87th Avenue, showing and old house and stable. It first appears on a 1909 map. 87th Avenue is in the foreground.
P. L. Sperr  April 23, 1936
